name: Tawa Chanp Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tawa Chanp Recipe: Mutton Chops 1 kg Tomatoes (chopped) 4 Onion (chopped) 2 Yogurt 2 cup Oil ½ cup Salt 1-1/2 Ginger ½ Black Pepper (crushed) 1 tbsp Green Chilies (sliced) 6-8 Red Chili Powder 1 tbsp Coriander Powder 2 tbsp Garam Masala Powder 1 tbsp Coriander (chopped) 1 cup Cumin Powder 2 tbsp
instructions: Heat oil on a flat pan and fry chops , now add tomatoes, onions and fry on high flame for 5 minutes. Now add salt and 2 cups water. Cook on low flame for 2 minutes, cover and leave it till water dries off. Add coriander, cumin, red chili powder, oil and cook for 5 minutes Add yogurt and cook for 2 minutes, add green chilies, black pepper , ginger and garam Masala. Cook on high flame till the oil starts coming off. Lastly add coriander and serve
